title: PingviArtist
author: PingviArtist
content: Hello everyone!I will be happy to find a temporary / permanent / one-time job for cryptocurrency as a game artist. I have a year of work with mobile games, in particular with such a project as "Idle Hacker Simulator" (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MoonlightDragonGames.IdleHackerSimulator)I work with vector and raster graphics in casual style and familiar with Unity's requirements for game assets.I offer myself as a reliable and responsible worker on projects, as well as help with small one-time tasks.Unfortunately, I have the status of "Brand new", so I can't add my works. You can find them here https://www.behance.net/pingvi.I only accept cryptocurrency (consider your offers).Thank you for your attention!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: PingviArtist on December 04, 2022, 02:11:45 PMUnfortunately, I have the status of "Brand new", so I can't add my works. You can find them here https://www.behance.net/pingvithere is a solution for that, you can buy a copper membership and then you will be able to post pictures that will be visible.if it's complicated or too much for you, you can post some of your works, and some of the older members will quote your post to have better visibility.

comments.author: PingviArtist
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on December 04, 2022, 03:03:09 PMQuote from: PingviArtist on December 04, 2022, 02:11:45 PMUnfortunately, I have the status of "Brand new", so I can't add my works. You can find them here https://www.behance.net/pingvithere is a solution for that, you can buy a copper membership and then you will be able to post pictures that will be visible.if it's complicated or too much for you, you can post some of your works, and some of the older members will quote your post to have better visibility.Thanks for the advice! Unfortunately, I cannot make any online payments or transfers, I only have cash

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: You have cool artworks in your portfolio. However, since you are in Bitcointalk, online payments especially crypto would be preferred by everyone here. It's not that hard to convert your cash into bitcoin.
